name: TheSonicVoicesMulticastBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to leaders in matters Voice First, Audio, and Sonic share their thoughts about their work and the space where they work. 

The content of this Flash Briefing is drawn from The Sonic Voices Multicast, a monthly podcast that lets listeners hear what several pioneers in the field of human language technology, voice first, audio, sonic branding, and other adjacent specialties, are up to. Each pioneer speaks for about 1 to 3 minutes to answer "the question of the month" or to fill in the audience on what they are doing and thinking about as they push forward with building for a new emerging Sonic world.

For more, please go here: https://witlingo.com/the-multicast/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
